channel.title: Tools on Kubernesto
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Kubernesto

item.title: My Productivity Story - Part 3
item.description: Welcome to part 3 of the My Productivity Story series. If you haven’t read parts 1 and 2, you should go and do it! But I’m going to talk only the about tools I have used on this one. So I don’t think is going to be needed. To Do tools Apple Reminders I already mentioned in part 1 of this series that my first tool was the Reminders app on my iPhone.
